mapper.select: SELECT U.user_id, U.name, U.pr, I.url, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post AS P WHERE P.user_id = U.user_id) AS numberOfPosts, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow WHERE followee_id = U.user_id) AS numberOfFollowers, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow WHERE follower_id = U.user_id) AS numberOfFollowees FROM user AS U LEFT JOIN image AS I ON U.user_id = I.user_id AND I.post_id IS NULL WHERE U.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT p.post_id, p.title, p.post, i.url AS main_image_url, COALESCE(b.post_id IS NOT NULL, false) AS bookmarked, u.name FROM post p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_id, url FROM image WHERE is_main = 1 ) i ON p.post_id = i.post_id LEFT JOIN bookmark b ON p.post_id = b.post_id LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id -- user 테이블과 조인 WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.post_id DESC LIMIT 2

SELECT p.post_id, p.title, p.post, i.url AS main_image_url, COALESCE(b.post_id IS NOT NULL, false) AS bookmarked, u.name FROM post p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_id, url FROM image WHERE is_main = 1 ) i ON p.post_id = i.post_id LEFT JOIN bookmark b ON p.post_id = b.post_id LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id -- user 테이블과 조인 WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.post_id DESC
AND p.category_id = #{params.category}

SELECT p.post_id, p.title, p.post, i.url AS main_image_url, COALESCE(b.post_id IS NOT NULL, false) AS bookmarked FROM post p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_id, url FROM image WHERE is_main = 1 ) i ON p.post_id = i.post_id LEFT JOIN bookmark b ON p.post_id = b.post_id AND b.user_id = #{userId} WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} AND p.deleted = false ORDER BY p.post_id DESC
AND p.category_id = #{params.category}
